In this article, we’ll delve into the untold story of Thelma Riley, her life before and after Ozzy, and the intriguing complexities of her relationship with the rock legend. Growing up in this bustling English city, she led a relatively quiet and ordinary life before crossing paths with Ozzy Osbourne. Her background is that of a typical English Woman of her generation, and little is known about her early years. However, her life took a dramatic turn when she met the man who would become one of the most iconic figures in the history of rock music.
